snippet.title: Warcry Challenges - Announcement trailer - Future Games Show E3 2021
snippet.description:
Check out this announcement trailer for WarCry Challenges. WarCry Challenges is a skill based Fast FPS, featuring challenging short levels and brutal gunfights.  Players must make use of powers such as slow motion, stomp, grappling hook or "force" style melee, do 360° and backflips and above all, compete for the first place and improve your skill in over 180 frantic challenges!

Watch out for Warcry Challenges when it stops defying gravity and launches… drops? on PC this summer.
Wishlist on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1608470/Warcry_Challenges/
Follow on twitter: https://twitter.com/warcrythegame
Join the Discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/vYv4QhgE7y
